summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Houzz Pro Scraper functionality. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate), frontend UI updated with new SCRAPE HOUZZ PRO button, and complete integration between frontend and backend functional. The scraper system is fully operational and ready for production use.
